title: Update Home hero content and browser title to Axses branding

requirements.summary: Update the Home hero to show the game title “Axses” centered near the top as the most prominent text.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the first screen shows "Axses" centered near the top (upper portion) and it is visually the most prominent text element in the hero area.
The layout remains responsive on mobile and desktop without overlapping text.

file_operations.description: Adjust the hero layout so the primary heading text becomes “Axses”, positioned in the upper portion and centered. Ensure typography makes it the most prominent element (e.g., largest size/weight and existing hero-title styling) and keep other hero content from overlapping on small screens.

requirements.summary: Add a centered developer/credits block to the bottom area of the Home hero including the release window 2027–2028.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home hero shows all four lines of the credit block near the bottom area of the first screen.
The release window displays as “2027–2028” (en dash) and is labeled in English as “Release Window: 2027–2028”.

file_operations.description: Add a bottom-positioned (lower portion of first screen) centered credits block within the hero: “Developer: Rohan Kadam”, “Solo Game Developer”, “Studying FY BSc (Game Developer)”, and “Release Window: 2027–2028” (use an en dash). Ensure text remains clearly readable over the background (e.g., spacing and optional subtle overlay/backdrop) and responsive.

requirements.summary: Display the studio name “Night Magic” on the Home hero in italic red text.
acceptanceCriteria: "Night Magic" appears on the first screen and is italicized.
"Night Magic" uses a red font color (readable against the hero background).

file_operations.description: Add the studio name text “Night Magic” to the hero content (first screen) and style it with italic typography and a red text color that remains readable against the hero background (adjust shade/contrast as needed).

requirements.summary: Set the browser tab/page title to “Axses”.
acceptanceCriteria: The document title displayed in the browser tab is "Axses".

file_operations.description: Update the HTML document <title> to exactly “Axses” so the browser tab shows the game name.
